It was an exciting ride from start to finish but happy it’s over!

Just want to thank you for everything you’ve done to make this an easy ride!

Yes, I would recommend you and your services to family and friends, no questions asked.

P.S. except the important one to help me reach my goal!

Sue H.

I would like to sincerely thank Lucas for his honesty, advice, perseverance, expertise, and guidance!!!! Lucas helped us every step of the way to select the right mortgage to suit my family’s needs. Lucas’s promptness in responding to my questions was exceptional. His motto “to save you money” truly works!!! I truly appreciated Lucas’s help and highly recommend him to anyone!!!

Raman K.

Lucas helped me with a refinancing for my home. I was hesitant to start this process as I was afraid that it would be difficult with a lot of hurdles to jump through and I had no idea where to start as I know nothing in this field. Lucas was very patient, and explained every step along the way and made me feel confident I was making the right decision in the end. I don’t know why I didn’t get in touch with him sooner... I would have saved even more money!

R. Morin

My husband and I had the pleasure of working with Lucas in obtaining our recent mortgage. Lucas is very knowledgeable, professional and his personality shines. We were totally satisfied with our new mortgage and Lucas played a big part in making this happen. We would strongly recommend him if you are looking for a mortgage in the future.

Thank you again Lucas for everything!

Nic & Teresa D.

Lucas always had our best interest at heart. He provided us with options to consider and went above and beyond to make sure we were informed, comfortable and that our needs were met. I would work with Lucas again and highly recommend him.

Karine & Pete D.

We were looking to purchase an estate home. With the homes we have purchased over the years, this was the first time we were purchasing an estate home, we were stressed to say the least. We reached out to Lucas to get advice and guidance on how we could make this happen. Lucas was patient with us and took the time to answer all our questions. He was always available any time we reached out. Lucas lowered our stress by explaining all the financial details. We were so happy with his knowledge and the service he provided. I am happy to recommend Lucas to everyone I know. Thank you for making this a stress-free process.

Joe & Tina

When it comes to buying your first home it can be really scary.  We elected to purchase a home during the global pandemic.  This isn’t an easy decision for most as jobs, careers, futures are all up in the air right now.  We were living in a low-rise apartment building at the time and from March ‘till July there had been construction so loud from 7 am - 5 pm every day that it was time to pull a trigger. I had worked with Lucas in a different industry before and knew what kind of character he always brought to the table.  Dependable is the important word here, there’s nothing worse than trying to purchase a very expensive item and having terrible communication.  With Lucas it was perfect communication, never a day went by when I wanted to have an update and I got it. We started to hunt at the start of June and by July 24th we were in our new home.  Lucas also hooked us up with our Realtor who was able to narrow down the homes we were looking for.  Funny thing was that we found our home online ourselves but our Realtor was the one who gave us the great opportunity to realize it by seeing other homes first.  With Lucas, we were able to get an amazing rate, amazing terms and there was zero pressure.  The only hard work we had to do was 2 hours of putting together the paperwork and that’s all.  The signing was digital and quick, even the meetings over the phone to explain the mortgage information and terms were quick. Both my wife and I would like to thank Lucas again for his hard work, we both look forward to his services again when we renew in 5 years.

Jenn & Jeremy H.

Lucas has been great for my partner and me. He helped guild us through the anxiety of the refinancing process, explained everything clearly, and made sure that we understood those explanations. The work he did for us will help us out greatly going forward.​

Thanks again!

Dave & Ev

I highly recommend Lucas as a mortgage broker! While I was shopping around for brokers, Lucas was always willing to go the extra mile for me to get me the best rate he could and did a bunch of math to figure out multiple scenarios I had given him (to know how much I’d pay; biweekly, accelerated, monthly, all at different rates with a different possible downpayment amount). When I had any questions or concerns, he was right there to call or message to help me and find the answers. I chose Lucas over my bank due to his commitment to helping me throughout the whole process, and his help & support still continues!

Thank you so much, Lucas!

Kirstyn N.
